label: A2B4C_oP28_62_ac_2cd_c-001
title: Forsterite (Mg$_{2}$SiO$_{4}$, $S1_{2}$) Structure
comments:
This structure is the magnesium end-point of olivine, (Mg,Fe)$_{2}$SiO$_{4}$. 
 We use the structural data taken by (Hazen, 1976) at 23${^\circ}$C. 
 For olivine structures where the (2a) and (2c) sites have different species, see \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC4D_oP28_62_c_a_2cd_c-001}{the monticellite structure page}. 
 (Hazen, 1976) reports the structure in the $Pbnm$ setting of space group \#62. We have transformed this into the standard $Pnma$ setting.
